thread.title: Bill Russell crashes Russell Westbrook's 'Stats' commercial with NBA history lesson
thread.title_full: Bill Russell crashes Russell Westbrook's 'Stats' commercial with NBA history lesson

title: Bill Russell crashes Russell Westbrook's 'Stats' commercial with NBA history lesson
text:
Tweet Oct 26, 2016; Philadelphia, PA, USA; Oklahoma City Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) reacts to a fan during the first quarter against the Philadelphia 76ers at Wells Fargo Center. Bill Streicher-USA TODAY Sports 
If Russell Westbrook wants to teach advanced basketball analytics, he first has to learn more lessons from the master. 
Foot Locker and Jordan Brand on Tuesday released a new commercial, in which the Oklahoma City Thunder introduces the world to some of his favorite “stats.” Amid his MVP-caliber season, NBA fans certainly are keen to learn about Westbrook’s Vine-saving, neglect-inducing feats. 
But Boston Celtics legend Bill Russell intervened when Westbrook made a boast that was too ridiculous to go unchallenged. 
The elder Russell needed only to point to one stat, his 11 NBA titles, to back his claim, but that would just be mean to Westbrook. 
This article first appeared on NESN.com and was syndicated with permission.
